description: This file defines a Flutter widget called NoteCard, which displays information about a Note object, including title, content preview, tags, and last modified date, and handles tap interactions to open a modal editor.

classes.name: NoteCard
classes.description: A stateless Flutter widget that presents a card UI for a Note object, including title, content snippet, tags, and last modification date, with tap-to-edit functionality.

methods.name: NoteCard
methods.description: Constructor for NoteCard widget, requiring a Note object.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the NoteCard, creating UI elements based on note properties.
